root.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_constants (uid uuid NOT NULL, "col_a3" text, "col_a1" uuid, "col_a2" uuid, "col_a4" text, "col_a5" text, "col_a6" integer, "col_a7" integer, "col_a8" integer, "col_a9" integer, "col_b1" integer, "col_b2" integer, PRIMARY KEY(uid));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_a02 (uid uuid NOT NULL, "col_a7" text, "col_a6" timestamp without time zone, "col_a8" text, "col_a9" integer, "col_b1" numeric, "col_a1" uuid, "col_a2" uuid, "col_a4" text, "col_a3" uuid, "col_a5" boolean, "col_b2" numeric, "col_b3" numeric, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_a01 (uid uuid NOT NULL, "col_a1" text, "col_a2" text, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_a03 (uid uuid NOT NULL, "col_a1" text, "col_a4" text, "col_a3" timestamp without time zone, "col_a2" uuid, "col_a5" text, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_a17 (uid uuid NOT NULL, owner uuid NOT NULL, "col_a1" text, "col_a2" text, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS tab_a17_owner_idx ON tab_a17 (owner);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_a04 (uid uuid NOT NULL, "col_a1" text, "col_a2" text, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_a05 (uid uuid NOT NULL, "col_a1" text, "col_a2" uuid, "col_a3" integer, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_a07 (uid uuid NOT NULL, "col_a3" text, "col_a4" text, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_a08 (uid uuid NOT NULL, "col_a4" text, "col_a3" text, "col_a5" text, "col_a6" text, "col_a7" text, "col_a1" text, "col_a2" text, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_a09 (uid uuid NOT NULL, "col_a1" text, "col_a3" uuid, "col_a2" timestamp without time zone, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_a53 (uid uuid NOT NULL, "col_a1" text, "col_a3" integer, "col_a4" text, "col_a2" timestamp without time zone, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tab_a19 (uid uuid NOT NULL, period timestamp without time zone NOT NULL, income bool NOT NULL, owner uuid NOT NULL, "col_a1" uuid, "col_a2" numeric, PRIMARY KEY(uid));
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS tab_a19_period_idx ON tab_a19 (period);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS tab_a19_income_idx ON tab_a19 (income);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS tab_a19_owner_idx ON tab_a19 (owner);
